ai-tha-ap302:1.3_0: He also gave a piece of cloth,
ai-tha-ap302:2.3_0: Awakened, a disciple of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap302:2.4_0: for the attainment of the highest goal.
ai-tha-ap302:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap302:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap302:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
ai-tha-ap302:6.1_0: The ten training rules and the most senior monk who had ten years of seniority.
ai-tha-ap302:6.2_0: The thirty sections on those on the ground.
ai-tha-ap302:10.2_0: rid of the stain of stinginess.
ai-tha-ap302:11.1_0: Hair in bags and their curling,
ai-tha-ap302:12.3_0: Tissā, apply yourself to a hundred
ai-tha-ap302:12.4_0: The courtesan, too, taught the Dhamma.
ai-tha-ap302:14.1_0: The third group of nine is finished.
